Title: We All Pay Eventually
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jennifer Ames, Steve Turner
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood joins forces with Gordon to save his friends from Stowe. Meanwhile, Proctor heads to Philadelphia to settle the score with Frazier, as Bunker is set on his personal revenge against his brother.
